Key Match Events: Michael Leask hit a four and a six in the 17th over
Richie Berrington hit a six in the 18.3 over
Post-Match Reflections: Losing captain Gerhard Erasmus reacts to Namibia's loss: 'It's a big rivalry between us and at a World Cup, after putting 150 on the board, there's not a better opportunity. Unfortunately we let it slip.'
Scotland captain Richie Berrington: 'It's an important win. We've given ourselves a chance to go through now so two big games to come.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland's opening game against England was washed out
Namibia beat Oman in their first match
Others: Scotland now take on Oman on Sunday night; a win would give them a superb chance of qualifying for the Super 8s
If Scotland win this game, which it now looks likely they will, they go top of the group.
